TopicTitle: Mighoul Saboodo(Maxmaps) is invited to The White House ?!?

Articles.Content: Wow! Good for him!

Wow!

I sincerely hope they don't introduce him as Mr. Saboodo.

Edited October 13, 2015 by Randazzo
*Tries to think of something to say* *Time passes* *Completely fails* Congrats!

That'll be an interesting conversation with Immigration. "Please state the reason of your visit" "The president invited me over"

Congratulations!
That's pretty impressive.
So... the President of the United States plays KSP? Congrats Maxmaps. I wonder what his Forum username is?

So... the President of the United States plays KSP? Congrats Maxmaps. I wonder what his Forum username is?

Probably 'POTUS'
Given his KSP abilities... I hope they don't ask him to run NASA...

Seriously? Wow!

It's not another early April fool is it?

Congratulations Max.

So... the President of the United States plays KSP? Congrats Maxmaps. I wonder what his Forum username is?

Astronomy night was something his administration started in 2009. Primarily the event is centered around encouraging young kids to get interested in Astronomy and Space Travel. He might play KSP but it is more likely that Obama administration members in charge of the event in simply recognized Squad as one of the newest educators of space travel, and lets face it, it's one of the best educational media there is for younger kids as well as adults. Not that it shouldn't be considered a great honor, but these invitations are not likely sent by Obama himself, he is a busy man.

So... the President of the United States plays KSP? Congrats Maxmaps. I wonder what his Forum username is?

Not necessarily. He might just be an avid fan of the Friday night Squadcasts.
Obama Kerman,

So... the President of the United States plays KSP? Congrats Maxmaps. I wonder what his Forum username is?

The work of NASA, no doubt. I bet this particular letter took 4X as long and cost 10X more than budget, not to mention being canceled once and re-prioritized several times.
i thought they invited him to be president by that headline...well as long as he can film obama playing KSP i'd say it is the best thing ever

Wait wut.

Congratulations!

Shame the guys doing the coding didn't get an invite.

Assuming this is real, please tell me they did.

Not necessarily. He might just be an avid fan of the Friday night Squadcasts.

That's the most realistic assumption.
moar booster

Shame the guys doing the coding didn't get an invite.

Assuming this is real, please tell me they did.
Jeeze, they don't give you much in the way of advanced notice.

Well then, if the next patch gets delayed some more because the devs are out of town, we can now all say:

"Thanks, Obama..."

There are many metrics of success. This just happens to be one of the better ones.

Congrats Squad!
Niiice
Jeez. Get Obama to play KSP. Get him to transfer the military budget to Nasa for good measure...
